item.description:
Hi Incubators!!

It's winter time and I havent seen many of you in awhile!  We had a stellar week of teamwork associated improv games, building stories, and creating crazy characters as always.

This week come on out for another couple hours of fun!

Remember this group is for everyone, actors, improv comediens looking for extra practice or just looking to destress from your week and do something random, fun, and maybe a bit challenging for the brain. 

Smile and come on down, your up next on the cambridge improv incubator!

Again, no previous acting or improv experience required.

Smile!  Hope to see you Thursday.

Any questions or concerns let me know!

Cheers! 

Peace, prosperity, happiness, and basic human goodness!

Jason J.
item.how_to_find_us: Follow the laughter or weird sounding voices into the room of improv!
item.why: Improv games are fun and its getting cold out so we need to warm up!!
item.name: ImprovNormal Ding-Activity 3!! This week's incubator!! Be scared to laugh!
